items.title: Meta’s AI Innovations Drive $850 Price Target as Analysts See Strong Q2 Ahead
items.summary: Meta Platforms, Inc. is seeing a rise in stock value due to their AI innovations, with analysts predicting a strong Q2. Canaccord Genuity analyst Maria Ripps raised Meta's price target to $850 on July 16.
